rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Art Deco styled living area with geometric patterns and bold colors, positioned facing the garden to encourage positive energy flow per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, featuring a large dining table and comfortable seating. The design follows Art Deco aesthetics with elegant details.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom is designed in Art Deco style with luxurious finishes and ample natural light from Vastu-compliant placements, facing the north-east.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living space for staff, incorporating basic comforts and a private entrance in line with local building norms.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Functional washroom area attached to the servant's quarters, designed with privacy and functionality in mind.

openings.description: Double-leaf door on the main facade facing the garden, built with robust materials and decorative Art Deco motifs.
Archway leading from the front entrance into a central courtyard, ensuring proper ventilation and light according to Vastu principles.
Multiple windows across rooms designed to allow natural light while maintaining privacy. Windows are strategically placed based on Vastu guidelines for auspicious directions.
